title: Creamy bacon, fresh herb and cod fish chowder
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 rashers bacon, chopped', '300g chopped onion', '4 fresh mushrooms, sliced', '1 stalk celery, chopped', '1 teaspoon crushed chilli flakes', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill', '950ml chicken stock', '480ml fish stock', '700g diced potatoes', '900g cod fillet, diced into 1cm cubes', 'celery salt to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper, to taste', '700ml single cream', '1 tablespoon fresh chopped parsley', '1 tablespoon fresh chopped basil', '1 tablespoon fresh chopped tarragon', 'hot pepper sauce, to taste']
